faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions about InvoiceDesign.
faq.q1: How do I create my first invoice?
faq.a1: It's very simple! Go to the Dashboard, choose a template, fill in your information and your client's, add your services, then export to PDF. The whole process takes less than 5 minutes.
faq.q2: Can I use InvoiceDesign without creating an account?
faq.a2: Yes, you can test the editor without an account. However, to save your invoices, manage your clients, and access your history, a (free) account is required.
faq.q3: Are my invoices compliant with legal standards?
faq.a3: Our templates include all mandatory elements for a compliant invoice in France and most European countries: invoice number, dates, legal information, VAT, etc.
faq.a4: You can export your invoices in high-quality PDF. PNG format is also available to easily share your invoices on social media.
faq.q5: Can I customize colors and logo?
faq.a5: Absolutely! You can change the primary color, text, background, and add your company logo with the position and size of your choice.
faq.q6: How do I recover my password?
faq.a6: On the login page, click 'Forgot password'. You'll receive an email with a link to reset your password.
